data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home x64 v1803 & iOS 12.1 (tested on iPhone 5s and iPad mini 3 which both worked)
data.actual_result: The red 1 icon temporarily displays next to the server icon you were mentioned on on device 2.
data.expected_result: Since you immediately see the mention on device 1, the mention shouldn't show up on device 2 at all.
data.short_description: When mentioned in a channel you are already looking at, the mention shows up next to the server icon on another device.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a channel in any server on device 1 - Have device 2 in front of you logged into the same Discord account, but not selected on the same channel - Have someone mention you in the channel you are observing with device 1 - Observe the server icon on device 2 - Notice how the mention appears for ~1-2 seconds and then disappears again
